channel.title: CVE Feed for The rsyslog Project -- rsyslog:
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The rsyslog Project -- rsyslog:

item.title: CVE-2018-16881|2024-08-05T10:32:54.189Z -- the%20rsyslog%20project -- rsyslog%3A
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in rsyslog in the imptcp module. An attacker could send a specially crafted message to the imptcp socket, which would cause rsyslog to crash. Versions before 8.27.0 are vulnerable.
